STEP 4 - Get AccessPointInfo list Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED

STEP 6 - Check that tokens are unique STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Get Access Point list with offset = 0 Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Check that tokens are unique STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Check that lists are the same STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED
